channel.title: Conquest 317 - Begin Your Adventure! [FULL RELEASE]
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/3dGTl.png[/img]
Conquest is a server i've been working on for some time to release for people to play. You will notice upon log in a lot of things are different in this server than that in which is in other servers.
[CENTER]Introduction: [COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR] Hello everyone! After weeks of testing and updating I can finally say I am ready to fully host this server! [/CENTER]
[B][U]Current Progress: Updates Completed: 800/800 (required for beta: 600 | required for release: 800+)[/U][/B]
[B][I][U]Media: [/U][/I][/B]
Home Media:
[img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_17.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=758834256324[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_14.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=97253365209[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_15.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=432131789158[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3hZge.jpg[/img]
Training Teleports:
[img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_16.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=885512762702[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_12.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=95749212196[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_7.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=747028507058[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_5.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=501764330313[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_4.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=341230053454[/img]
Skilling Areas:
[img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_8.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=80689455149[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_9.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=649287489009[/img]
Bosses and MiniGames:
[img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_13.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=565600252709[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_6.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=422290244139[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_1.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=267344892024[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_10.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=465632939245[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/756d8be8_l.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/234dcc3e_l.png[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_11.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=513453372520[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H388dP5hUWc&feature=youtu.be]Null - YouTube[/url]
]
[ul][*]Possibility of getting the 'Best Chance Casket' drop. [*]Gold Member's Slayer Dungeon [*]Possibility of getting a 75K scroll drop. [*][$] Rank In-Game & Donator Emblem [*]Gold Member's Skilling Island [*]+25 extra points from the Boss Endurance mini-game. [*]Strykewyrm Teleport[/ul]
Support my server? Add this code to your signature and show your support! [code] [Xurl=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][Ximg]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url] [/code] Remove the two X's from the code above and it will look like this: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url]
Thanks for your time everyone!
Webclient - http://www.conquest-317.com/play/ Downloadable Client - http://www.conquest-317.com/play/Webclient.zip Forums - http://www.conquest-317.com
Please no hate, as it will be disgarded this being the beta a lot of things are able to be changed. [/CENTER]

item.title: Conquest 317 - Begin Your Adventure! [FULL RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:523879”][quote author=MicroZoft link=topic=642423.msg4328969#msg4328969 date=1373392044]
And we’re back up!
[/quote]why you using this thread? you have another…[/quote]

This is already know, and I’m sorry I just guess I didn’t really think it through when I moved from beta to full release. If a mod could possibly either combine the two, or delete this one and update the old one I would have no problem with it.

Read full topic
